website_summaries.verdict: If a malware infestation keeps you from booting Windows or running an antivirus scan, the bootable FixMeStick can save you. But don't ditch your existing antivirus; FixMeStick offers no real-time protection.
pros: Excellent handling of USB boot, both BIOS and UEFI
Remote remediation and live chat support tool built in
cons: In testing, didn't remove all executable files, and left behind many non-executable traces

customer_reviews.title: Virus removal tool
customer_reviews.text: The programme removed viruses from my computer exactly as promised. Brilliant. The good news is that it is available for future use as required.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Although the stick worked fine you never mentioned the £39
customer_reviews.text: Although the stick worked fine you never mentioned the £39.99 you had to pay before it was activated, bad drill really.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic saves going to the repair shop , who would charge you two or three times more to repair, at first I had to install it quite a few times thought it didn't work but persisted and was glad I did it took roughly 3 hrs to go through clearing all the virus then cleaned the computer so glad I brought this will recommend it to all my friends

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work; utterly useless; no immediate response form manufacturer's support line; eventual response too little and far too late for product of this nature. A clearly overrated product, for which its manufacturer's claims are highly questionable and customer 'support' is ineffectual. In summary: costly, useless and relieved that I could send it back without losing my money.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Glad that I bought a FixMe Stick

I ran scans with my Internet Suite followed by my Anti-Malware software, both of which found nothing. I then tried the FixMe Stick which found, and removed, two threats! So I am extremely glad that I have the FixMe and I shall be using it every couple of weeks to sweep up anything missed by my software.

customer_reviews.text: I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT AND ALSO THE SERVICE PROVIDED, I HAD A TROJAN ON MY LAPTOP CALLED 'VOSTERAN' AND I COULDN'T GET RID OF IT. MY LOCAL PC REPAIR SHOP SAID THE ONLY WAY TO FIX IT WOULD BE A FULL SYSTEM RESTORE FOR 87 EURO. . . BUT THE FIXMESTICK PEOPLE REMOTELY REMOVED IT FOR ME FREE OF CHARGE! . . WOW!! YOU CAN'T GET A BETTER SERVICE THAN THAT! . . . A BIG THANK YOU TO ALL AT FIXMESTICK.

customer_reviews.title: !Limited in  Scope / can even be Misleading!
customer_reviews.text: got this nearly a year ago, and have used it quite frequently to date on quite a number of computers- most recently ran it on a pc and it gave the 'No Infections Found' at the conclusion ; then immediately thereafter ran a Free SuperAntispyware scan on same pc, which found Five Trojans; from this we might conclude that not only is the fixmestick limited in scope, but it can also be misleading!
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: It did the job.
customer_reviews.text: I used to transfer my hard drive to another machine, as a slave drive, to check and clean it of infections. This device does the same job much more simply, and without the bother of transferring the drive. Also being immune to malware written for windows, its superior to any other method. It does seem slower than avg antivirus program though.

customer_reviews.title: it was bloody brilliant it got a lot of problems I just wanted ...

customer_reviews.title: Technical Support is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other positive reviews.It is very handy for not particulary technical people.The bonus is that you ever get stuck with anything you can call up support from their technical bods and they can connect remotely to your computer and fix it. I just had all my browsers hijacked by aartemis.The fix me stick itself did not see this as a threat and remove it but one request for support got the ball rolling and we are back in business.That is what customer service is about.
customer_reviews.author: martin john lowe

customer_reviews.title: Could do with help phone number
customer_reviews.text: It didn't run straight away but it showed me another way and then I ran it which cleaned computer. Switch off and on and tap f8,f9 & f10 buttons til something happens, ha ha. It would be a good idea to have uk number on it as use of computer to find area code will be difficult when you have a virus jamming all.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is crap does not work Made my computer worse Will be looking for a refund One star is to much

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product and excellent customer service - very happy
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product - with excellent customer service. Eliminates "nasties" that get past your firewall and virus screening system. A pricey product, but well worth it to stop spyware and Trojans from enabling others to steal your data and passwords. I have had to contact the company once with an issue - and they responded very fast and very professionally. I have had this product a while, and can assure you that updates are added frequently - updates boot up each time you use the stick - so it will not go out of date and will continue to battle the latest threats.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Onopko

customer_reviews.title: Did absolutely nothing. Didn't find anything didn't fix anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing. Didn't find anything didn't fix anything. Paid 60$ Tried it on a friends computer that started acting strange. Just kept spinning. It did not work on that either

customer_reviews.title: When I ran this program, it literally ran for ...
customer_reviews.text: When I ran this program, it literally ran for 30 hours and did NOTHING to remove the viruses on my laptop. My computer is behaving exactly the same as it did before I received this. I requested a refund and received an email from them asking me to contact their IT support. I still want a refund so that I can buy something that ACTUALLY WORKS. Do yourself a favor and avoid this fixmestick nonesense!

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service

customer_reviews.author: E Rose

customer_reviews.title: MY experiences
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 4th year with FixMeStick...Three years ago i had a desktop and a laptop that had slowed to a crawl, I read about This product and decided to try it. FixMeStick found several "bugs" and took them out and both worked MUCH better ! I've since replaced both computers and have been using FixMeStick (along with AVG) and have had NO MORE PROBLEMS.
customer_reviews.author: J. Greig Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with hopes that it would remove viruses and boy, I was wrong. I tried it on two computers and only one time did it find 2 viruses, when my computers was full of malware. Have been so disappointed in this product. One thing that I can say is, Tech support was very helpful but they did not alleviate the viruses in my computer.
customer_reviews.author: tjuana

customer_reviews.title: does not boot up like it says
customer_reviews.text: have spent hour with there support and tried at least 50 time . Still nothing the email me instruction and i keep trying no way to speak to some one for step by step instruction as you so thru process . but the one they sent me is not one that you just plug in that for sure . they sent me a email today so i started a chat and the wanted start this all over again . So if you buy dont expect it work like the say . Mine is sitting on the shelf collecting dust for the last 7 months . All i have to say is GOOD LUCK
customer_reviews.author: cleves3

customer_reviews.title: The cured one is racing along like the day I bought it we will take the ...
customer_reviews.text: It kind of works. I have two infected desktops both near death. It worked on one but not the other. The cured one is racing along like the day I bought it we will take the other off life support and move on.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Raymond

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I still have problems. Messages on screen say I still problems
customer_reviews.author: James D. Mc Dermott

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to keep my decrepit old PC going for an extra two years. It was constantly crashing because XP was no longer being updated but using FixMe Stick would set things right and keep it going for a little while longer. Only stopped using it because by the time the subscription expired, I had bought a new PC. Still think about getting another one though...just in case. One caveat though...it is REALLY SLOW. Like, plug it in and don't expect to use your computer again for at least 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie

customer_reviews.title: It works great and would strongly recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I work in Alaska during the summer and reside in Texas during the Fall, Winter and Spring. Well this summer I ordered a Fix-me stick while I was in Alaska, when I got back to Texas I bought a new Laptop and after a little bit I decided to run the fix-me stick on it, but it was nowhere to be found! I contacted Marco who works in customer service with Fix-ME and told him that I had lost my Fix-Me stick and he said no probe and immediately sent me a new replacement stick. It works great and would strongly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Trojans gone, YEAH!
customer_reviews.text: Kinda surprised, it really worked! I had Trojans that would come on, 5 of them, every time I turned on my pc, windows 7. I am not a techie, and was unable to get rid of them, which were "serious" threats. I scanned and scanned but that did not help stop their return. This was EZ, and no more Trojans. Yeah! Less expensive and more convenient than taking my pc to the shop for three days, and losing all my settings. Glad I saw it advertised on TV to learn about Fix Me Stick.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: and it is recommended that people do not use this
customer_reviews.text: I was dismayed to find that the "FixMeStick" has an "imbedded multi-scanner" made by Kaspersky, which is a proven spyware. All government agencies have removed all anti-virus made by Kaspersky, and it is recommended that people do not use this. I do not understand why Amazon continues to sell this.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCES BIAFORE-GAILFOIL

customer_reviews.title: This product cleaned up a lot of irritating problems my ...
customer_reviews.text: This product cleaned up a lot of irritating problems my computer was having. My computer runs much faster and and the product did find some malware and fixed that. I will use the product on both of our other computers. I purchased a 1 yr. license on this product and I appreciated the fact that I didn't have to have someone I don't know working on my computer. This is a reasonably priced product for cleaning your computer
customer_reviews.author: M. Downing

customer_reviews.title: I generally let it run at bedtime and everything is fine by the morning
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It does take a long time to do a thorough scan, so save it for a time when you are not busy.. I generally let it run at bedtime and everything is fine by the morning.

But you have to jump through hoops for other virus's to clean/remove them where another virus removal system at basically the same price did it automatically.
customer_reviews.author: WisdomSpirit

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product has saved me from having a total meltdown. It fixed my computer completely, and it works like it is brand new. It's fast again, no hestitations anymore. It took out all the destructive elements hiding in it, and now it feels so clean and innocent again. All I can say is that this product is one of the best purchases I have made in a long, long time. Thank you Fixmestick, you're the greatest.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It made my computer stop working had to call a repair person
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Noe

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but still needed my anti malware to do some ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but still needed my anti malware to do some work afterwards. This FixMeStick does work great but takes a considerable amount of time almost 4 hrs for my computer but it goes deep. You might want to do a custom scan so you can pick what not to scan like photos and music library which could save some time on the scan . I give it thumbs up and it runs before Windows so it's like sneaking in the back door before Windows starts and before any viruses to come alive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shutdown/boot issue
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work cause the computer wasn't shut down properly. My computer wouldn't boot, the usb booted on its own and ran as expected but it wouldn't delete the virus' due to the fact that it needed to be shutdown properly. The computer won't boot in its own, so that's impossible. Thought i would let everyone know about the shutdown problem since they didn't. I'll give 3 stars cause it works, just not in my situation
customer_reviews.author: customer 7

customer_reviews.title: great service
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought it and had some concerns that people were having issues using it but decided to buy it anyway because of the customer service. I had no problems using it but did call customer service for something else. I did see where people had some trouble getting through. When I called it did give me a recording with no option to leave a message. within 30 minutes they called me back. Was impressed because I did not leave a message or phone number. Question answered. It was very easy to use and on two computers it removed stuff and third one it said no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nel Konkle

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second when I couldn't find my first one, it is that good!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Fix-Me-Stick that I have purchased. The first one being lost somewhere in the house after being used on just about every computer we own. It worked well enough and was so simple to use, this was my first thought when our main computer started acting up. I was ready to fork out the money for a second one, when the first could not be located. For anyone that is not computer smart and wants to run a first rate defense again viruses, malware and slowing computers. I would say buy this product TODAY!.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C - Amature Artist

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.text: My first clue should have been before even trying to "Scan" my p/c it was trying to SELL me more junk. fixmestick exe. After 7 hours of "scanning" I had the same problem and I can't get my money back. because I USED IT and once opened you can't send it back! that should have been the don't even think about buying this garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cowen

customer_reviews.title: I have Norton 360 on one of my computers. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have Norton 360 on one of my computers.Ran all the scans with it,including power eraser. Then I used the FixMeStick...and it found a lot of hidden malware. Color me impressed !!! Looking forward to see what FixMeStick finds on an older computer next.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L.

product_meta.title: FixMeStick Gold Computer Virus Removal Stick for Windows PCs - Unlimited Use on Up to 3 Laptops or Desktops for 1 Year - Works with Your Antivirus
feature_bullets: EXPERT TECHNOLOGY ANYONE CAN USE: plug it in and the FixMeStick reboots your computer from a system on the stick to remove viruses that snuck past your antivirus software. The FixMeStick is like having your own IT department in the palm of your hand.

REMOVES THE LATEST THREATS: The FixMeStick automatically updates its industry-leading engines from Avira, McAfee, and Sophos plus more in the cloud for up-to-the-second detection and removal of the latest threats.

SAVE MONEY AND TIME: A trip to the computer repair store takes days and costs hundreds of dollars. Instead, run your FixMeStick once a month from the comfort and privacy of your home to remove any viruses, Trojans, rootkits, ransomware, or other malware lurking on your system.

DURABLE DESIGN: Capless, high-quality metallic USB with fully encapsulated chip on board (COB) technology that is waterproof, shockproof and dustproof. Built in keyring so you always have it with you.

WHAT YOU GET: FixMeStick Virus Removal Tool for Windows PCs (Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, and 10. 512 MB RAM required), Getting Started Guide, our virus removal guarantee backed by our friendly North-American based Customer Support Team.
